Enid.Midgley Museum:
The Midgley Museum is a city-owned museum located in the city of Enid, Oklahoma.
The museum's exhibits include a large mineral and rock collection that features a 7,000-pound petrified stump and fluorescent rocks that must be viewed under a black light.


== History ==
The items displayed in the museum were collected by the Midgley family that came to the United States from England in the 1870s.
